poster.title: Big Buck Bunny
poster.label: Latest Movie
poster.description: Big Buck Bunny tells the story of a giant rabbit with a heart bigger than himself. When one sunny day three rodents rudely harass him by throwing nuts, hitting his flowers, and destroying his home, he snaps and goes after them.

comments.comment: Great for kids and adults alike!
